title: La Esquina Asiatica
typeOfFood: Ovo, Chinese, Japanese, Take-out, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a mix of Asian foods, and many things can be made vegetarian if not already. The Japanese fried noodles (with tofu), cashew nut chicken (ask for tofu instead), curry (with tofu) and couple of the wraps can all be requested vegan. Located on second level, across the street from Casa de Yoga; ring doorbell to enter.
